results.title: Zoo
results.creator_credit: Firebird Films, Arthur Cantrill and Corinne Cantrill
results.brief_description: David spends a happy day at the zoo looking at and feeding all the animals. When he returns home, he makes a zoo of his own. The animals come to life and the monkeys imprison the keeper and begin to release the other animals. Disaster threatens but Elsie the elephant comes to the rescue. Cast: Aaron Judah. Narration: Aaron Judah. Music: Alan Lane.

results.title: Zoo
results.brief_description: Visual essay comparing people and animals at a zoo. Using a ‘candid camera’ technique, Haanstra concentrates on commonly shared facial expressions and physical gestures such as eating and sleeping. Accompanied by a jazz music soundtrack but no spoken commentary.
results.description: Visual essay comparing people and animals at a zoo. Using a ‘candid camera’ technique, Haanstra concentrates on commonly shared facial expressions and physical gestures such as eating and sleeping. Accompanied by a jazz music soundtrack but no spoken commentary.

results.creator_credit: Multimedia Design, Faculty of Design, Swinburne University of Technology and Cam Panlock
results.brief_description: This dark 2D animation features a battered little doll in a gloomy prison. When the lid to his box is opened, what happens to Zonbi? WARNING: Some scenes may disturb younger viewers

results.title: Zonation
results.creator_credit: Sydney Scientific Film Society and H Scales
results.brief_description: A group of university students study the zonation pattern of animals and plants on a marine rock platform, and the various physical and biological factors contributing to their distribution. At the highest tide level are blue periwinkles; then the barnacle zone, the worm zone and at low tide level, the cunjevoizone and then kelps. The ways in which various creatures protect themselves against dessication from sun and wind and against being washed off the rocks are shown.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sydney Scientific Film Society and H Scales

results.title: Zoetrope
results.brief_description: Animation device called Zoetrope and assorted animation strips. Body of Zoetrope is a cylinder formation closed on bottom and open at top with a series of slits around top rim and painted green. Wood spindle joins cylinder to metal tiered stand. Zoetrope has five various themed printed paper animation strips depicting illustrations of a sequence of drawings showing motion. Animation strips are either black and white or mono coloured with an animation on both sides.

results.title: Zlateh the Goat
results.creator_credit: Morton Schindel, Weston Woods Studios and Gene Deitch
results.brief_description: Winter is late so for Reuven the furrier it is a bad year. After long hesitation he decides to sell Zlateh the goat. However, the pet goat is spared from the butcher’s knife when she saves her young master from a snowstorm.

results.title: Zirconia: the toughest ceramic
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Researchers”.
Partially stabilized zirconia (or PSZ) is a new development in industrial ceramics and is probably the toughest ceramic ever made. Developed by researchers at CSIRO’s Division of Materials Science, PSZ has a number of unique properties which make it suitable for a variety of engineering applications.

results.title: Zinc
results.creator_credit: Barrie Whatley, Open University and BBC-TV
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Principles of Chemical Processes”.
Electrochemistry, thermodynamics and chemical kinetics are used to provide the basis for explaining the industrial extraction of zinc from its ores.

results.title: Zimbabwe, Botswana & Namibia
results.creator_credit: Phil Frank, Stephen Lennhoff and Pilot Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Lonely planet: the experience”.
Join Andrew Daddo as he explores Zimbabwe, Botswana and Namibia in another ‘Lonely Planet’ travel video. Bungee jump above the Zambezi river, snack on the delicacy of boiled worms, come face to face with a pride of lions, canoe through crocodile infested waters and ride in a dunebuggy over the Namibia desert.
